text: Ratchet & Clank most often refers to: * Ratchet & Clank, a video game series and media franchise Ratchet & Clank could also refer to: * Ratchet & Clank, a 2002 video game * Ratchet & Clank, a 2016 video game * Ratchet & Clank, a 2016 animated movie based on the video game series
title: Ratchet & Clank
